snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - Lets Fix some Bugs and Use JPEG Image Compression (Ep 7)
snippet.description:
Today we'll take it a little easy and fix two bugs related to registering a new user, and logging then back in from our login screen.  More specifically, we need to update the nav bar title to reflect our user's name.  Next, I'll talk about how you can use JPEG image compression to reduce the file sizes of your image uploads to make things even faster.  Lastly, we'll go over adding an image view and label inside a container view for our nav bar title view.

Previous Episode 6:
https://youtu.be/GX4mcOOUrWQ

All episodes for Firebase 3 series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEfHqwjBV0XFb9qx9cGXwkq

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/firebase-chat-messenger

Want to learn more about iOS Development? Here are a few additional playlist resources on my channel:

Lets Build YouTube series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JGKdVUtA5xds1zcyzsz7HLj

Lets Build AppStore series: 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEXct3-OV6itP7Kz3tRDmma

Lets Build Facebook Feed series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHDWIO3x4wePhD8G4d1Fa6N

Lets Build Facebook Messenger series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHGoEg41IJNk9QQ_hPWcyRo
